Package com.rays.util

Class EmailMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rays.util.EmailMessage
  • public class EmailMessage
extends Object
    A simple JavaBean representing an email message. It contains recipient information, subject, content, and message type (HTML or Text).
    Author:
    Aastik Sahu
